definition: to visit a prisoner (usu. a relative or friend)
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: The minister's visit to the prison was not instructive .
sentences.chinese: 牧師這次探監沒有意義。

sentences.english: Allow jail time to be covered under family medical leave policy.
sentences.chinese: 在家庭醫療休假政策中加上探監時間。

definition: lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
to denounce/to condemn/to call to account/to punish
to make a report after the event/to make a supplementary report/to repay a kindness
to act in collusion (idiom); in cahoots with/villains will look after one another
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
to make sth difficult/to create obstacles
running of armed forces/military management/to govern armed forces/to direct troops
